text: tatha logon mein vah (bhee) hai jo ibaadat (vandana) karata hai allaah kee, ek kinaare par hokar[1] , phir yadi use koee laabh pahunchata hai, to vah santosh ho jaata hai aur yadi use koee pareeksha aa lage, to munh ke bal phir jaata hai. vah kshati mein pad gaya lok tatha paralok kee aur yahee khulee kshati hai
